p: The combination of antivirals has been tested with other medications such as arbidol and carrimycin and its efficacy against the novel coronavirus infection has been informed. Therefore, its use has been widely proposed ([ 73] ClinicalTrials.gov. Identifier NCT04275388). Currently several trials compare lopinavir-ritonavir treatment and other drugs for COVID-19â€”versus ARB ([ 74] ClinicalTrials.gov, Identifier NCT04295551).
